subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: For 35 years, the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup has seen ever bigger and faster boats compete in the sparkling waters of the Mediterranean off Porto Cervo, Sardinia.
snippet: For 35 years, the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup has seen ever bigger and faster boats compete in the sparkling waters of the Mediterranean off Porto Cervo, Sardinia.
